meanings.definition: One of six children or offspring born at the same birth.
meanings.sent1: The family was surprised by the arrival of a sextuplet, adding joy to their home.
meanings.sent2: The hospital prepared for the birth of a sextuplet, ensuring all necessary arrangements were in place.
meanings.sent3: The sextuplet in the family always kept everyone on their toes with their playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with a sextuplet of colorful flowers, brightening up the entire yard.
meanings.sent5: The sextuplet of puppies wagged their tails in unison, a delightful sight for all to see.

meanings.definition: A group of six notes played in the time of four.
meanings.sent1: The musician effortlessly played the sextuplet of notes, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: In music class, the students practiced playing the challenging sextuplet with precision.
meanings.sent3: The sextuplet of notes danced across the music sheet, bringing life to the composition.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the sextuplet resonated through the concert hall, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The pianist's fingers moved swiftly to play the intricate sextuplet, showcasing their skill.
